1.0.name: wordpress/syntax-highlighting-editor
1.0.description:
Plugin Syntax Highlighting Editor replaces a simple editor for editing files textarea themes or plugins in the admin panel. The new editor has syntax highlighting for your own language. It is very convenient to read code than plain text. Next available syntaxes: html css js php xml sql

In a plugin, you can specify the following settings: The choice of syntactic default editor Select language Default Editor

p.s. Sorry, this text is translated G Translator
